main.name: Jonny Benoit
main.description: I am a recent college graduate web development engineer and I use react and vue.js to develop pages. This project is a resume template that can be used as the project home page or resume page
main.bio: I am a recent college graduate interested in Earth processes related to climate change. My primary background is in physical oceanography, computational modeling, and remote sensing. Recently, I have found a passion for field work, glaciology, scientific communication, and thinking about science more broadly during my time on the Juneau Icefield.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.
